app_descript:
Telegram

Brief: Telegram is a highly acclaimed messaging application offering a seamless communication experience across various devices - computers, tablets, and mobile phones. Known for its rapid message delivery, Telegram lets users share an extensive array of digital content, including large-sized videos and diverse file formats (documents, archives, PDFs, etc.) at high speeds without limitations. A standout feature is its cloud-based message syncing that ensures you never lose your conversation history. With an unwavering commitment to privacy, Telegram messages are not only encrypted but can also self-destruct for added security.
